title: Respirometer data rat mouse, 5 answer options 2

content.prompt: Which of the following would most adversely affect the validity of this experiment?

choices.label: Large variation in metabolic rates between individuals of a species
Using a brown rat and a white mouse
Using a thermometer that consistently read 2Â°C too low
Using a scale that consistently indicated 2 grams too much

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
